{% if letter_head %} {{ letter_head }} {% endif %}

{{"قطعه للتجاره والخياطه"}}
{{ doc.company }}
{{"Souq Al Wakrah, Al Mathaf St, Al Wakrrah, Zone 90, Building 55, Shop 6"}}, {{"+974-50455909"}}, {{"info@qetah.qa"}}, {{"www.qetah.qa"}}

{{ _("Customer") }}: {{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ _("Mobile No") }}: {{ doc.contact_mobile}}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{{ _("Time") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_time") }}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- if item.discount_percentage -%} {% else %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}

{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
{{ _("SR.No") }}:
{{ item.serial_no | replace("\n", ", ") }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }} @
{{ item.rate }}
({{ item.discount_percentage }}%off)		{{ item.qty }} @
{{ item.rate }}		{{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{% for row in doc.payments %} {% endfor %}
{{ row.mode_of_payment }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{% if doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% for row in doc.taxes %} {% if not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if doc.discount_amount %} {% endif %} {% if doc.rounded_total %} {% endif %} {% if doc.change_amount %} {% endif %}
{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }}
{{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
{% if '%' in row.description %} {{ row.description }} {% else %} {{ row.description }}@{{ row.rate }}% {% endif %} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
